description: This file implements various functions related to Wi-Fi CSI data processing, including processing received CSI data, updating pinger configurations, and starting/stopping CSI measurement sessions. It contains functions for managing CSI sounding per MAC address, handling external callbacks, and initializing the CSI module within a Wi-Fi application context.

methods.name: INT process_csi(mac_address_t mac_addr,wifi_csi_data_t * csi_data)
methods.description: Processes incoming CSI data, creates a Wi-Fi event, copies relevant data, and notifies the application manager.

methods.name: void update_pinger_config(int ap_index,mac_addr_t mac_addr,bool pause_pinger)
methods.description: Updates the configuration of the pinger based on CSI activity, protected by compile-time conditionals.

methods.name: int csi_start_fn(void * csi_app,unsigned int ap_index,mac_addr_t mac_addr,int sounding_app)
methods.description: Starts CSI measurement for a given MAC address, managing a hash map of active soundings and handling resource limitations.

methods.name: int csi_stop_fn(void * csi_app,unsigned int ap_index,mac_addr_t mac_addr,int sounding_app)
methods.description: Stops CSI measurement for a given MAC address, updating internal state and freeing resources.

methods.name: int csi_init(wifi_app_t * app,unsigned int create_flag)
methods.description: Initializes the CSI subsystem for the Wi-Fi app, registering callbacks, creating data structures, and setting function pointers.

ctags.name: csi_start_fn
ctags.pattern: /^int csi_start_fn(void* csi_app, unsigned int ap_index, mac_addr_t mac_addr, int sounding_app)$/

ctags.name: csi_stop_fn
ctags.pattern: /^int csi_stop_fn(void* csi_app, unsigned int ap_index, mac_addr_t mac_addr, int sounding_app)$/

ctags.name: update_pinger_config
ctags.pattern: /^void update_pinger_config(int ap_index, mac_addr_t mac_addr, bool pause_pinger)$/
